I was born and raised in Miami,Fl but I moved and established a life in GA. I wanted to be a radiology tech or physican assitant but now I am a cloud Engineer I used to be scared of dogs until I was 18 and then I forced my mom to get me a dog. I love to cook and bake but I dont care to eat or try what I made. I just love the process. I am the second oldest of 5 My Birtday is 4/14 and my dogs is 3/13 so I say he was meant to be my dog Art is my therapy.
